document.discussion_title: Photo contest puts seniors in the picture
document.topic_text: Photo contest puts seniors in the picture The Moorpark Active Adult Center is taking entries for the annual photo contest. The contest is open to residents of Ventura County who are 55 years of age or up and who are amateur photographers. The photo categories are: Nature and Landscape, Around the World, Animals and Wildlife, People and Still Life. Prizes will be awarded for Best of Show, Best of Division and Peoples’ Overall Choice. Entries can be dropped off Sept. 1 to 16 at the Moorpark Active Adult Center, 799 Moorpark Ave. All entries are due by 3:30 p.m. Fri., Sept. 16. Photos will be on exhibit from Sept. 19 through 30. For registration and contest rules, drop by the center or call (805) 517-6261 or go to www.moorparkca.gov .
